Description:
Detection for when multi factor authentication has been disabled, which might indicate a malicious activity to bypass authentication mechanisms.

Author: @ionsor
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Disabled MFA to Bypass Authentication Mechanisms
Query: sourcetype='azure-activitylogs' eql select * from _source_ where eventsource = 'azureactivedirectory' and eventname = 'disable strong authentication.' and status = 'success'
